document_data.caption: The House of Knowledge, as it stood in Tir na Og.
document_data.name: House of Knowledge
document_data.mainbody:
The '''House of Knowledge''' was a [[celestial plane]] in the [[World Tree cosmology]] model In the [[Great Wheel cosmology]] it was the [[divine realm]] of [[Oghma]] on the [[Outlands]]. The realm had a strong connection to the magic of [[true name]]s.

Oghma's library held an original copy of [[Gargauth]]'s journal from his time as emissary for the [[Lords of the Nine]]. [[Cyric]] perused this journal to find a [[spell]] that would let him see through all divine barriers and deceptions to aid in finding [[Kelemvor]]'s soul.<ref>
